storyInfo: Thorns refuses to fix the compass for Juana, and it seems the sailors support his decision behind their leader's back. Meanwhile, Elysium and Weedy come to Aarón to find the missing Thorns.

attributes.content: You're always looking out to sea when you're alone.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: When I was but a wee babe, you'd pick me up, point out into the distance, and tell me that if I kept going that-a-ways, I'd see an ocean bluer than the sky above.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: That was fifty years ago.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: There's things that happened a hundred years ago you still haven't forgotten, señora.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Oh, my little perlita, if you had captained a ship across the churning waves like I once had, seen lightning crash into lightning between the clouds, heard the unending peals of thunder...
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: You'd never forget a moment of it your entire life either.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I'm mighty curious, though, what's this sea the old folks keep going on about really like?
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: I've lived in this Flat my whole life, so I don't get it at all, no matter how much I rack my brains.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Before my old man died, he'd talk day in day out about going out to sea, about how he followed you and Captain Cruz in filling your holds with treasure—so full your ships would be low in the water.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Your father was the nimblest topman I've ever seen. He'd climb masts like he was going for a stroll in a garden.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Shame there's not many sailors left who've actually seen the sea for themselves.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: And that's my biggest worry, señora. Even with the compass leading the way, we lack seasoned sailors.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: When it comes to the sea, Perlita, we are all reckless, ignorant children.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: *Sigh* ...Nowadays, it's starting to feel like even heading out into the Flat's more trouble than it's worth.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: A little fowlbeast told me that a particularly astounding fellow has come to Aarón, and in the process cut off nearly all our trade routes.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Have they finally decided to take us seriously?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: He managed to sniff out all the sites we use to contact the caravans like some kinda beckbeast. Few decades ago, the useless bastards in town couldn't even spot our footprints.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Stealing the compass out from under the noses of a massive garrison. To the Inquisition, it might as well have been both humiliation and provocation.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: They'll do whatever they can to find us. It won't be easy.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: We're running out of time, and the boy won't budge... What do we do, señora?
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: What if he's telling the truth? That he's not an alchemist?
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: I am absolutely certain he is one, Perlita.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: The coin on him has the symbols for 'salt' and 'water' on its faces. A set of symbols particular to the school of alchemy. And that particular combination means 'look to the sea for life'.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I am familiar with the coin's former owner, Aulus. He was the most talented of the alchemists.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Moreover, the boy has the same style of swordplay as him. Even their speech has similarities as well.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Even if they knew each other, that doesn't mean he taught him anything. The coin could've been a gift.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: No. If Aulus gave that to someone, it can only mean he had unusually high expectations for him.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: According to their traditions, the coin can only be passed from teacher to student.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: So why won't he admit it, then?
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: That puzzles me as well. I've already made it perfectly clear he has nothing to fear if he cooperates...
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Young Isidro bites down on the root of his tooth with great force, but he cannot stem the flow of stinging pain bubbling up from his gum.
Before him, a former classmate's corpse lies under the foot of his mentor.
The corpse's long-cold limbs are lined with an azure mucus that makes him retch.
Through the tears in his eyes, a gentle voice like flowing water pierces the depths of his heart.
Why do you wipe away your tears, Isidro?
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: You killed him...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: The sea and the land are as one. To mix them together is nothing more than erasing the barriers between them.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: He decided, of his own free will, to embrace the salt and water flowing within his own body, to share all of his existence with us.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: Be not afraid, be not hateful, derisive, loathing... Shut not the windows, bar not the doors, close not your heart. No longer shall there be polluted blood or shameful pain.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: There will come a day when all will give their all to each other.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: Suddenly, the corpse on the floor jerks like a fin out of water, letting out a gurgle of what sounds like grief, before falling flat once more.
Isidro watches the corpse's eyelids slowly lift, revealing the eyes of some unfamiliar creature.
Its lips open wide, and a voice, human yet inhuman, warbles out.
'You are... the same... as me...'
No—!
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I will never... I will never be like you...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I won't...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Mm-ph!
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: (Flops about)
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: Hmm...?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: (Claps fins together)
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: (Nibbles ferociously)
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: Ow! What are you doing?!
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Nene twists around his leg, trying to use its rotund body to cover his foot.
A variety of sounds leak into the shed from his surroundings. Some weeping, some arguing, but mostly cursing.
Isidro hopes they aren't cursing at him. Wait... He freezes in place as the gears in his subconscious mind begin to turn.
He sticks out his head. No guard outside his door. How unusual.
A line of people walk through the middle of the haven, their heads hung low, their clothes smeared with blood.
Those at the back of the line are dragging planks behind them, with people sporting heinous wounds lying atop them. The wounds are so deep their bones are visible, bandaged only with rags.
Their blood has soaked into the planks, leaving behind long red streaks on the white salt.
Only the occasional gasp stands as proof that they still live.
Only half of 'em made it back...
attributes.name: Dismayed Woman

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: What... What happened out there?
attributes.name: Dismayed Woman

attributes.content: The Inquisition capullos ambushed us at dawn on the only road out. A lot of our mates gave their lives to see us live... Took everything we had to escape.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: The townsfolk don't have salt ships. How'd they get deep enough into the Flat to even find you?
attributes.name: Sad Man

attributes.content: Who knows?
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: They're like ghosts, like they don't feel pain. They don't even fall down if you cut them open. They just get right back to attacking you instead.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: (Whispers) The clerics in town barely knew the blade from the hilt... How could they pull off something like this?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Oh, there you are, Teach. Where's the rest of your men? Managed to get done what needed doing?
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Heavy losses, just like you. There's another crew I haven't heard a peep from either.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: ...If this goes on, we won't even have enough men to continue salvaging.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Teach is about to say something when she spots Isidro among the crowd.
She walks over, grabs him, and drags him to Rus.
How'd you get out?
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: No guard at the door.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Bring him with you.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Me?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Aye.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: I say nay.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: I'm saying nay too. This is your problem. I'm not getting involved.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: If you want to eat, you have to work, chaval. If not alchemy, then you'll have to offer something else.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Why not just let me go already?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Don't even think about it. Best prepare yourself to spend the rest of your days here. We're sorely low on manpower.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: ...Stop pulling me.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Morning of the day after tomorrow, Rus, you bring the boy here. I'll go tell the boss.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: What is even going on right now?
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Mm-ph!
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: You want to come along too?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: (Nods furiously)
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: (Gnaws fin indignantly)
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: Put the luggage down here, Leaf.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Wait up, Weedy!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I don't understand... Why did you bring so much stuff with you?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I haven't seen Thorns in a while, right? As his best friend, it's only natural I have a few things to give him.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: You could've let Leaf carry them.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Why bother, when this is barely any—
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Mierda, the box broke open.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: *Sigh* Help tidy this stuff up, Leaf.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: What a big bag... Cleanser, lotion... Oof, that's heavy! Why so many skincare products?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: How else am I supposed to protect myself from this scorching sun? I'm not having a repeat of the tragedy from my last holiday.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Holiday? Aren't we here to find Thorns after he went missing?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Bah, he's a big boy now, he can handle getting a little lost. Let's see, what's in this bag here... Oh right, clothes.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Do you really need an entire suitcase full of outfits for this mission?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: As a representative of Rhodes Island, it's very important that I maintain a certain image.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Wait, so which of these were you giving to Thorns?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: That package there, the one you're stepping on!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Sunscreen... Waterproof, cooling, whitening... Does he really need any of this?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: What kind of friend would I be if I let him burn to a crisp?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: ...Well, you know him better, so if you say so.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Hey, careful with those, watch what you're throwing!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Someone's coming. We shouldn't block the street.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Will you be holding a sermon for us tonight, Señor Alguacil?
attributes.name: Pious Townsperson

attributes.content: Also, I must thank you! My wife used to sneak into the kitchen every night to eat the grain we had stored away, while keeping to the teachings against gluttony by day.
attributes.name: Pious Townsperson

attributes.content: But ever since hearing you preach, she hasn't sinned even once! Your teachings have cleansed her soul, and for that, I am grateful beyond words!
attributes.name: Pious Townsperson

attributes.content: I merely shared with everyone all my worldly possessions...
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: You... You are far too humble, señor.
attributes.name: Pious Townsperson

attributes.content: Señor Alguacil, please, allow me to hold your hand. Such frightful events have happened in Aarón lately, and I'm terribly afraid...
attributes.name: Grateful Townsperson

attributes.content: You may, if it might bring you comfort.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Wh—While I have never sinned, I was wondering if you could...
attributes.name: Sincere Townsperson

attributes.content: If you could lay your hand atop my head...
attributes.name: Sincere Townsperson

attributes.content: Alright, no crowding, one at a time!
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Control yourselves! Think about your request before your turn comes! Do not take up too much of the Alguacil's time!
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: (Whispers) The locals here seem a little... odd...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (Whispers) Probably because they trust in the Inquisition.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: (Whispers) Maybe...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I wonder who's in charge here.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: May I help the two of you?
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Ah, that would be amazing! What should I call you, amigo?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Anastasio is my name.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: (Whispers) This dude's really popular...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (Whispers) That's for sure. Everyone who sees him stops to greet him.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Calificador Silver is waiting inside. Pray, enter.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Ah, the burden of those cursed with charm. I know it all too well, amigo.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: ...Pardon?
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Is this man your...?
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Oh, we're just colleagues. Honestly, I barely know him.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: *Ahem* I am afraid we do not have what we need to hold a proper reception for you, my guests.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: The town granary was recently burnt down by bandits, so I'm afraid we're all going a bit hungry before the next caravan arrives.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Don't worry about it, we brought our own food.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I am truly sorry for this.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: I believe we have yet to formally introduce ourselves?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: This is Field Operator Elysium, and I'm Engineering Operator Weedy, both from Rhodes Island Pharmaceuticals.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: You're an engineer, then?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Yes, I am.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Are you familiar with the mechanics behind wind-powered light landships?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Well, my specialty is bioengineering, so I can't say I'm too familiar with mechanical engineering. However, based on my limited knowledge, I'd say it would be difficult to realize.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: It's different from seaborne ships. If the materials aren't robust enough, the ship will fall apart the moment it tries to move.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: (Impatiently blows at his red streak of hair)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: What if we used steel for the keel?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: I'm afraid that would make them too heavy. That's precisely why it's difficult to make wind-powered ones.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Then would you say making such a landship is near impossible?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: No, I'm sure someone could come up with a design. Once you manage to work out the kinks, the actual construction shouldn't be too difficult.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Well, if we're talking about today's Iberia trapped in its own web... It wouldn't be much more difficult than making a traditional landship.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I see...
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: (Impatiently waves his hands)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Look, I'm terribly sorry, but shouldn't we, uh, talk business first?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: For example, the whereabouts of my friend...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Dios mio, forgive me! I got carried away. Could you describe him for me?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: That's crazy, there's no way!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: There's no way he'd do something like that!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Calm down, Señor Elysium. I am simply stating the facts.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: What you're saying is that a Rhodes Island operator colluded with bandits from the Salt Flat, both in stealing the corpses of the townspeople and arranging a rescue from his execution.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: He never mentioned Rhodes Island during the interrogation... but the crimes are real.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Ahem. There must be some sort of misunderstanding here.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I regret to inform you that all the information we have points towards him being this criminal.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Mm-ph!
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: (Wriggles about)
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: I said, stop following me already.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Show Nene a little more respect, chaval.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: I'm treating it the way I would treat any of you.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Which clearly isn't respectful enough. Nene's far more useful than you are.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: I thought it was your emergency rations.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: It's practically the boss's heart and soul! Who'd dare harm a scale on its head?
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Besides, it's got far sharper senses than us out in the Flat. How else are we supposed to find anything under all that salt?
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: What are you looking for?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Hah, what else? Relics of the Golden Age. Sometimes high-tech curios, sometimes luxury items or whatever else. Good money either way.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: But doesn't the Inquisition crack down on these sorts of excavations for Golden Age antiques?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: They may not like it, but the caravans sneaking into Iberia sure do. We trade these trinkets for water and supplies. It beats begging, that's for sure.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: So it's smuggling...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Don't give me that look. You think it's easy, living out here?
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: But you, chaval...
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Every last one of the materials we got you for your alchemy, down to the smallest finbone, was bought by the blood, sweat, and tears of our crew.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: ...So think it over. If you know you can't do it, then don't waste our booty.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: What are you suggesting?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Do a little hoo-hah during your alchemy, show the boss you failed, and give her a reason to back down from this madness.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: (Whispers) Can't you just, I don't know, let me go?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Also, why not tell her that yourself?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Don't want her to think we're against the plan. We respect her... fear her.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Fear? Well, I suppose she is an amazing fighter.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: There're better reasons to be afraid of her.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Juana stops in her tracks, as though she sensed something in the wind.
She looks behind her. She sees no trace of any living creature, besides her own footprints left on the desolate Salt Flat.
She breathes a sigh of relief and continues onwards. There is a giant skeleton in front of her, and below it, a dark shadow.
She steps into the shadow, and disappears.
There was a mutiny, back in the day, but only a few old bastards still remember it.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Someone said—in front of everyone—that she'd been working with the sea monsters, that she offered her entire crew up for freakish strength and longevity.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: You mean the Seaborn?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Whatever they're called. At the time, the sea had only just retreated, and the monsters were still running wild. It was thanks to Captain Cruz and his crew risking life and limb that most of 'em were cleared out.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: And Captain Cruz... They all died out in the Flat. Well, almost all. Juana was the only one to come back.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: And when she did, she took over the entire fleet. Anyone who didn't wanna follow her ended up dying, one by one. On hunting trips or in Inquisition ambushes.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: You said these were just rumors.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: ...Even Teach was but a lass when this all went down.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: So you think she isn't actually trying to fix the compass to help everyone find a way out?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Mayhaps... Could be part of a much bigger plan. Nobody knows what she really wants.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Are you the only one who suspects her, Señor Rus?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: ...There's a few of us.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: What about Señor Javier?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: No, that boy has never doubted her for a second.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: She's taken care of him so long, he sees her as a mother. She took him under her wing after his mother died.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Those Seaborn in the rumors... Have any of the sailors ever seen one?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Nope... Not a one.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Mmp...Mmph!
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: *Glub*—!
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: What's its problem?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Hah, looks like Nene found something.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Stow the sails, you scallywags! Drop anchor! We're setting down!
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: You heard him! Get digging!
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: Remember to bring your shovel and your sword, chaval. Don't even think about running. I'll have someone keep an eye on you.
attributes.name: Rus
